snippet: Washington, the only state ever to have legalized abortion through a popular vote, is now debating a law that would require health insurers to pay for an elective abortion.
abstract: Washington, already nation's only state ever to have legalized abortion through popular vote, is now debating law that would require health insurers to pay for elective abortion.
lead_paragraph: Washington, the only state ever to have legalized abortion through a popular vote, is now debating a law that would require health insurers to pay for an elective abortion.

headline.seo: Washington State Abortion Debate Counters the Trend
headline.main: In Washington, Abortion Debate Counters Trend
headline.print_headline: In Washington, Abortion Debate Counters Trend

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
